item.title: Trump transfers all his DJT shares to his revocable trust, new SEC filings show
item.description: Donald Trump's shares in Trump Media, owner of the Truth Social app, were worth about $4 billion, the largest portion of his net worth.

item.title: Father, son plead guilty in $100 million New Jersey deli stock scheme
item.description: A father and son pleaded guilty in a stock manipulation scheme involving a small New Jersey deli whose parent company had an improbable $100 million m...

item.title: Darden Restaurants stock climbs as Olive Garden, LongHorn Steakhouse fuel sales growth
item.description: Darden Restaurants met Wall Street's expectations for its fiscal second-quarter results.

item.title: Luigi Mangione hit with federal murder, stalking charges in UnitedHealthcare CEO killing
item.description: Luigi Mangione is charged with first-degree murder and other counts in the fatal shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson in New York.

item.title: FDA says Eli Lilly's weight loss drug Zepbound is no longer in shortage
item.description: The decision that will eventually bar compounding pharmacies from making unbranded versions of the injection.
